title: Bug 117981Any item can't be selected at the first time in library outline view.
description: Description: Any item can't be selected at the first time in library outline view.Steps to reproduce:1.
OB: Bug 117981Any item can't be selected at the first time in library outline view. The focus jumps to library file node in outline view.
EB: The second time I select the label item, it can be selected.
SR: Add a label in library file.2. Select the label item in library outline view.3.
